title: üì∏ Showcase Pioneer
description: Be one of the first to post a project in the new Member Showcase! Upload a photo and description of something you've made recently.
requirements: Post a project to the Showcase

title: üêõ Bug Hunter Beta
description: We need your help testing the new dashboard! Find a bug, report it using the Bug Tracker, and help us improve the system.
requirements: Bug must be verified by admin

title: üìç Check-In Streak
description: Test out the new QR code check-in system! Check in to the lab on 3 separate days this week.
requirements: Check in 3 times in one week

title: ü§ù Community Voice
description: Engage with your fellow makers! Leave a constructive comment or question on 3 different projects in the Showcase.

title: üé® Sticker Design Challenge
description: Design a cool sticker for the FabLab! The winning design will be printed and distributed to all members.

title: üéì Workshop Wizard
description: Share your knowledge! Host a workshop or class for other members on a topic you're passionate about.

title: üìö Wiki Writer
description: Help build our knowledge base. Write a tutorial or documentation page for a machine or process.

title: ü¶∫ Safety Scout
description: Keep the lab safe! Identify and report a safety hazard, or fix a minor safety issue (like organizing cables).
requirements: Report or fix a safety issue

title: üßπ Deep Clean: Laser
description: The laser cutters need love too. Perform a deep clean of the laser bed and optics (training required).

title: üñ®Ô∏è Deep Clean: 3D Printers
description: Help maintain our fleet. Clean print beds, check nozzles, and level beds on 3 printers.

title: üîß Tool Wall Tetris
description: Chaos reigns on the tool wall. Reorganize a section, outline tools, or label bins.

title: ‚ôªÔ∏è Scrap Sorter
description: The scrap bin is overflowing. Sort usable scraps from trash and organize the material rack.

title: üì± Social Share
description: Spread the word! Share a photo of your current project on social media and tag the FabLab.

title: ‚≠ê Google Review
description: Love the lab? Leave us a 5-star review on Google Maps to help others find us.

title: üëã New Member Buddy
description: Help a newbie! Spend an hour assisting a new member with their first project or machine setup.

title: üì∏ Event Photographer
description: Capture the moment. Take high-quality photos during a lab event or busy night for our marketing.

title: üßµ Filament Restocker
description: Check the 3D printing filament stock, organize spools, and list what colors we're low on.

title: üå™Ô∏è Woodshop Dust Buster
description: The dust collectors are full! Empty the bags and sweep the floor around the woodshop machines.

title: üõ†Ô∏è Repair Cafe Hero
description: Something broken? Fix a broken tool, chair, or equipment in the lab.

title: ü§ù Project Collaboration
description: Two heads are better than one. Complete a project that involves collaborating with another member.

title: üëã Open House Greeter
description: Be the face of the lab. Volunteer to man the front desk or give tours during an Open House event.

title: üíª Code Contributor
description: Hacker time. Submit a Pull Request to the FabLab's open-source repository (website, tools, etc.).

title: üé• Video Tutorial
description: Create a short video tutorial (TikTok/Reel/YouTube) demonstrating how to use a machine or technique.

title: üì¶ Material Donor
description: Got extra supplies? Donate useful materials (wood, acrylic, filament, electronics) to the community pile.

title: ü¶â Midnight Maker
description: Burning the midnight oil. Check in to the lab after 8 PM for a late-night build session.

title: üåÖ Early Bird
description: Rise and grind. Check in to the lab before 9 AM to start your day making.

title: üìÖ Weekend Warrior
description: No days off. Check in on both Saturday and Sunday in a single weekend.

title: üìù Feedback Loop
description: We want to hear from you. Complete the monthly member satisfaction survey.

title: ‚ôªÔ∏è Zero Waste Warrior
description: One man's trash is another's treasure. Create a project entirely from scrap bin materials.

title: üèóÔ∏è Master of Materials
description: Show off your versatility. Create a single project that uses at least 3 different machines (e.g., Laser, 3D Print, Wood).
